subject: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The USP Store Manager,
 i am currently at San Francisco International Airport with your Parcel, get back to me asap with ur delivery info for the Custom Clearance to enable me complete the delivery
. contact me via this email 
scholzeadolph@gmail.com

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello Mr. Adolph Scholze,

I hope this message finds you well. It's quite exciting to hear about a parcel for me! I'm curious, could you tell me more about what's inside the parcel? And how did it end up at San Francisco Airport?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
*UPS Delivery Company320 SAN BRUNO AVE, SAN FRANCISCO, CA.United State of
AmericaAttention Dear BeneficiaryI received your email and the content is
duly noted. Having cross-checked our Diav Diaz ry and i have confirmed that
your data is correct as the legal Beneficiary eligible to Receive the UPS
parcel Containing the your ATM CARD worth the sum of $15,000,000. 00 USD
Approved By the USA Department of Justice and the United Nation, However, I
am Currently at San Francisco international Airport with Your Envelope for
immediate Delivery to the provided Address.BELOW ARE THE DETAILS OF YOUR
ACTIVATED ATM CARD:Name On The Card:Pass Code: f57s49x5a8xx56Registration
Code JKT110948GATM Card Type: INT'L VISA CARDCard Number: 4577 9323 8206
7030Security Pin:I am Currently at the Custom Officer as I notified you
earlier, After Checking out The parcel and the worth of Your ATM CARD , the
Custom Officer Stated that you will need to Undergo A Custom Clearance as
Your CARD worth a huge amount of money , I Further my Investigation As a
professional Diplomat , it was made clear to me that According to the LAW
Governing the US Custom Defense , ACT 104 Hereby Decree That Any Item Worth
more than Five Million Above Should be Hold For Custom Clearance to Make
sure that the Funds is legitimate , to ensure that it did not relate to
anything Money Laundry or Any other Related Activities.As I notified you
,the Affidavit will cost you the sum of 75.00 usd only, And you are to
conduct the clearance as quickly as possible because You have 24hours to
conduct the clearance or your Card will be Confiscated.Be advised to
proceed with the fundamental aspect of this payment exercise as soon as
possible to enable me Complete the delivery of your card without Any
Further delay, choose from the below Quick Payment Service and get back to
me for the details to remit the Fee for the Clearance.1) BITCOIN (DIGITAL
CURRENCY)2) AMERICAN GIFT CARD PAYMENTThank you as we anticipate your
prompt response immediately.Yours FaithfullyAdolph Scholze *

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. I'm quite excited about the prospect of receiving an ATM card worth such a large sum! It's not every day that one gets such news.

I understand from your message that I need to undergo a custom clearance due to the high value of the card. However, I'm not very familiar with this process. Could you please explain it in more detail? What exactly does it entail?

You mentioned something about an Affidavit costing USD. How does this work? Is this a standard procedure for all deliveries of this nature?

Also, you suggested several payment methods like Bitcoin and American Gift Card. Could you provide more information on these options? Which one would be the most convenient and secure for me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. I'm thrilled to hear about the ATM card and its worth. It's quite a surprise! 

I understand that there are some customs procedures to follow due to the high value of the card. However, I'm not very familiar with these processes. Could you please explain more about this custom clearance? What does it involve exactly?

Also, you mentioned an Affidavit costing USD. Is this a standard procedure for all deliveries of this nature? And how does it ensure the legitimacy of the funds?

Lastly, you suggested several payment methods like Bitcoin and American Gift Card. Could you provide more details on how these work? I'm not very tech-savvy, so a simple explanation would be much appreciated.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
*UPS Delivery Company320 SAN BRUNO AVE, SAN FRANCISCO, CA.United State of
AmericaAttention Dear BeneficiaryI received your email and the content is
duly noted.*

*The Custom clearance Affidavit serve as a document indicating that such
item that worth huge amount of money has been cleared, as the law
prohibited such amount to enter the country.*

*Ã€ resolution was applied that if any amount worth 5 million usd above
should be allowed in to the state , it has to undergo the clearance as
mentioned on my previous email .*

*The reason 75.00 usd was mentioned is to let you know how much it will
cost you for the clearance and once you remit the fee , the Custom officer
will release the Affidavit to me which is known as Custom release
Affidavit.*

*Regarding the payment method , Bitcoin is generally accepted by the
company as trusted and easy way to direct a payment to company wallet
without any problem of network or wrong payment , likewise the gift card
payment , in case our customer is not buoyant enough for bank transfer
charges , they can easily get a gift card from any Walmart Store and send
it to the Company as their payment for clearance etc .*

*So , kindly get back to me asap as I'm still at the Custom office in San
Francisco and let me know how you prefer to make the payment either by the
Bitcoin or USA gift card such as Apple or Steam wallet gift card .*

*Thank you for your choosing UPS Currier Company .*

*Yours Faithfully*
*Mr. Adolph Scholze *

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello Mr. Adolph Scholze,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the Custom clearance Affidavit and the payment methods. I must say, it's quite interesting to learn about these procedures.

I'm curious though, why is Bitcoin or a USA gift card like Apple or Steam wallet gift card preferred? Is there any specific reason behind this preference?

Also, could you please explain a bit more about how the process works once I make the payment? What are the next steps that will be taken by UPS Currier Company?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
*UPS Delivery Company320 SAN BRUNO AVE, SAN FRANCISCO, CA.United State of
AmericaAttention Dear BeneficiaryI received your email and the content is
duly noted.*

*There is no hidden reason behind the payment method, you were just updated
on how to remit the required fee for the clearance , which I expected you
to have made the payment .*

*Once you remit the 75.00 usd Apple gift card , I will notify the company
Attorney , so he will submit the payment to the Custom Department for the
needful, to enable the Custom officer issued the Custom Release Affidavit
to me to complete the delivery.*

*I have spent 3 days here in the airport because of you , I am not happy
with the whole delays , **So , kindly go to nearby target store and buy an
apple gift card worth 75.00 usd and scratch it , you will also need to get
back to me with front and back photo of the apple card with the code .*

*The Airport authority has begin to question about the delay which might
lead to Confiscation of your ATM Card , so if you fail to remit the payment
today for the clearance , this delivery will be canceled and get
confiscated according to the Custom Officer in charge of the clearance .*

*I wait for your response asap with payment.*


*Thank you for your choosing UPS Currier Company .*

*Yours Faithfully*
*Mr. Adolph Scholze *

subject: Re: I am Mr. Adolph Scholze, The U
body:
Hello Mr. Adolph Scholze,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience and dedication in ensuring the delivery of my ATM card.

I'm curious about the payment method though. Why is it specifically an Apple gift card? Is there a particular reason for this choice? 

Also, could you please explain to me how the process works once I purchase the gift card? How does it get converted into a clearance fee?

I'm sorry for all these questions, but I just want to understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Deborah
